build_planet(pars, t, planet_index)Â¶

Builds a keplerian model for a single planet.

static planet_signal(t, per, tp, ecc, w, k)Â¶

Computes the RV signal of one planet for a given time vector.

Parameters

  • t (np.ndarray) â The times in units of per.

  • k (float) â The RV semi-amplitude.

  • per (float) â The period of the orbit in units of t.

  • tc (float) â The time of conjunction.

  • ecc (float) â The eccentricity of the bounded orbit.

  • w (float) â The angle of periastron

  • tp (float) â The time of perisatron

Returns

The rv signal for this planet.

Return type

np.ndarray
